name: HowmuchdoIcare
0:
”Alexa, ask care meter do I care?”
”Alexa, ask care meter how much do I care?”
”Alexa, ask care meter on a scale of zero to ten how much do I care?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: care meter
des: There are many times where we don't feel like thinking about how much we care. Now we can ask Alexa to do that for you! Simply say "Alexa, ask care meter do I care?" and she'll give you a response on a scale of 0 to 10. Pretty simple stuff.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
